product_name.description: The full name of the product

color.description: The primary color of the product

inference_rules: Extract brand names exactly as they appear.
Categorize items based on standard e-commerce categories.
Identify key features that describe the product's unique selling points.
Extract a concise, canonical product name (e.g., 'Pi Pico Microcontroller' instead of 'Raspberry Pi Pico with a magenta case').
